## What is Computational Statistics?

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
- Broad field that can mean different things depending on context.
- One definitions is that it is the use of computational methods to solve statistical problems,
  for instance
  - simulation,
  - optimization,
  - numerical integration,
  - data analysis, and
  - visualization.

:::

## Histograms

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}

```{r hist1}
hist(
  phipsi$phi,
  prob = TRUE,
  xlab = expression(phi),
  main = NULL
)
rug(phipsi$phi)
```

:::

::: {.column width="50%"}

```{r hist2}
hist(
  phipsi$psi,
  prob = TRUE,
  xlab = expression(psi),
  main = NULL
)
rug(phipsi$psi)
```
